0101101100011111 0101011110100101 0 -> sum: 1011001011000100, cout: 0
1011101101110101 0100001000010010 0 -> sum: 1111110110000111, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
